p: For intrinsic apoptosis, etoposide at 10 µM or blasticidin at 5 µg.mL −1 (InvivoGen, Toulouse, France) were added 16 h to 18 h as indicated in the legends. Alternatively, cells were treated with a dose of 400 mJ of UV (Uvitec, Cambridge, UK) and collected for death measurements 16 h after treatment.
